name: snake plushie
notes:
here’s a pattern for a simple snake, feasible for beginners and quick to work! i used fine chenille, 1 skein, but you can use your preferred yarn type and weight to have the best snake plushie for you.

---

contains:

- **desktop version**: 2 pdfs with pictures, in english and italian

- ️**printable version**: 1 pdf without pictures to print, 1 pdf pictures only (as reference for the printed one)
